title: Holy Saturday Broadcast: SINDONE – Ostensione Televisiva 2013 (1 hour and 33 minutes)
author: Andy Weiss

title: Holy Saturday Broadcast: SINDONE – Ostensione Televisiva 2013 (1 hour and 33 minutes)
post: In a T.V.documentary,a map of the route of the holy shroud from Jerusalem to Turin through all antique cities and places during five centuries.I am interested in those maps for studying purposes.Thanks for your attention.
author: juan c. bidot
